meanings.sent1: The kibbutznik helped harvest the crops.
meanings.sent2: Many kibbutzniks work together on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The kibbutznik joked about organizing a dance party in the barn.
meanings.sent4: She was a kibbutznik, always ready to lend a hand to her neighbors.
meanings.sent5: The kibbutznik's dedication to communal living was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Someone who lives in a kibbutz.
meanings.sent1: Every kibbutznik has a role in the community.
meanings.sent2: The kibbutznik enjoys the peaceful surroundings of the kibbutz.
meanings.sent3: The kibbutznik playfully argued about whose turn it was to cook dinner.
meanings.sent4: In the kibbutz, she felt like a kibbutznik puzzle piece fitting perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The kibbutznik's sense of belonging was unmatched within the community.
